vote.text: Amendment SA 4546 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4546 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Enzi. (consideration: CR S7181-7219; text: CR S7181-7218) To provide a complete substitute.
